title: Wanted: N172 Old Judge Cleveland Players
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Wanted: N172 Old Judge Cleveland Players
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric Angyal
Hello, I am putting together an Old Judge (N172) Cleveland team set and am looking to acquire the following players and managers ("Cleveland" designated cards only please):

Alberts
Beatin
Goodfellow
Hogan
Hotaling
Loftus
McKean
Oberlander
Stemmeyer
Tebeau
Twitchell
Williams
Daly (even though he never actually played for Cleveland)

I would prefer reasonably well centered cards with no creases or wrinkles - hopefully in vg+ condition or better.  Graded or ungraded - doesnt matter to me.  I can live with minor writing or ink stamps on the card back, but would like to avoid "major" back damage.  If anybody can help me out, please shoot me an e-mail me at:  angyale@att.net  

Thanks in advance,

Eric
